justification: Mentions B’s desire for upside but ignores specific preferences (rookies, injury buy-low, stacks) and B’s tendency to fade run-heavy offenses. Separates motivations superficially (A wants consistency, B wants ceiling) but misses A’s injury aversion when asking for Q Josh Martin and A’s preference for possession WRs (Torres isn’t). The swap is feasible and partly aligns with A’s schedule concerns and B’s upside chase, yet the rationale is generic and not grounded in roster/context details.
